attributes.action: Restrict car use by increasing tax to double the price of fuel for motor cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is accepted that travel by road vehicles must be reduced in order to reduce CO2 emissions, and to reduce nuisance, congestion, deaths and pollution. The biggest culprit in these areas are car drivers. With over 1.8 million people signing a petition against road pricing, a simpler way of curtailing demand for road travel is the tried and tested price mechanism. The system is already in place to collect the revenue. There will be no expense of tracking devices which cost money, use precious resources, and generate CO2 in their production and use.
